column5: I posted a few weeks back asking if anyone knew where i could buy Power bait Micro tubes (1") as i was having difficulty finding them.  I searched Berkely's website and could only find Atomic Tubes...some pre-rigged thingies.  I sent berkely an email asking if they had discontinued the original Micro tubes...here's the reply   Simon,  Sorry, you are correct it is obsolete.   Regards,  Meechelle Verwey  Customer Service    Pure Fishing Canada    Man that sucks.
Yeah that really sucks Simon I bought a package of them atomic teasers and they seem ok....  Will be trying them for pannies.... soon I hope  Jacques
hahaha, you serious?  the tens of thousands that are now at the bottom of our lakes....wicked!

Hey Simon! Try some of these!  http://www.greentophuntfish.com/browse.cfm/4,3990.html  They look kinda like a Scud (freshwater shrimp)  I also saw some of the power micro tubes on Ebay, you may want to check that out as well!
Check Brigdenorth Sports really big Berkley product store.  Garnet
mizmo makes micro tubes... i have a ton of them and they work great... i use them for bluegill and crappie and they never fail me!
Yea Even the BPS Tubes aren't Bad
I used to use em a lot too, but found that regular micros with a small piece of sponge with ur favourite scent, stuck in the opening works way better.
That sucks! They were a great brook trout producer!
